title: Confederates In The Attic - More To Come Soon
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Confederates In The Attic - More To Come Soon
posts.post_content:
A few Southern Leaguers who wont give up the fight.  They have been displaced by more respectable clones and have been confined in my attic.
They are ready to start a new life in new homes.

#1 - Frank King - PSA 3 - Piedmont reverse - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/z-folder/28294/king-sl[/IMG]

#2 - Ed Foster - SGC 10 - Old Mill SL reverse - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10248/foster-omsl[/IMG]

#3 - Harry Lentz (Sentz) - SGC 10 - Old Mill SL reverse - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10266/lentz-omsl[/IMG]

Or just say "I'll take 'em all" for SOLD.

There are a few more renegades in the attic.  Stay tuned, they are jealous.
I'll take them all. Thanks Frank. PM your PP. That sounds weird but I'm sure you get the drift.

That Foster fellow wouldn't talk, huh Frank?

Looks like you had to break out the pliers and blowtorch... :D

Hi Frank,

I'll take the Lee, Jackson, Longstreet and Beauregard.

Scot

Edited to add:  Stonewall, not Joe.

Damn too late.
I was quick on the draw to bring those Southern boys back home from the terrible wastelands of the damned Yankee north!
